content: a cosy cowl full of twisting twining cables i am not a pattern designer i simply enjoy playing around with stitches and seeing what happens if you spot a mistake or have a question please send me a message some things you might like to know before downloading the pattern skill level intermediate skills needed cast on knitting in the round cabling the knit stitch the purl stitch and cast off the pattern is written in a line by line format no chart finished sizes 27cm high x 52cm circumference approximately there were some slight variations between the different yarns materials required 175-225m aran yarn these are the amounts used for the test knits 4mm and 5mm 50cm circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge cable needle a stitch marker recommended but optional darning needle to sew in ends now for the the boring bit this is a digital knitting pattern to knit your own cowl with respect please do not take credit for the pattern claim the pattern as your own or sell the pattern selling completed cowls is fine but not the pattern or any part of the pattern if you sell the cowls online please link back to me for pattern credit by using this pattern you are agreeing to my terms thank-you and happy knitting
